content:
Informazioni utili da fornire nelle richieste al forum:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content: Cosa vuoi scaricare e da dove lo stai scaricando?
creator: @next

content: I think that's where the MS Store version of Thunderbird stores the profile, so nothing wrong in that regard if that's the version of Thunderbird you're using. I think I saw that mentioned in some KB article, but cannot find it now, all I can find are references to that in other threads on various forumsâ€¦
creator: DavidGG

content:
What type of account is this (POP, IMAP)? What are your settings for When I delete a message in the account Server Settings?

What do you mean you set it to "Do not delete" a thousand times? What setting are you referring to, the one in Synchronization & Storeag or what? And why would you do that more than once? Does the setting not stick or what?
creator: DavidGG

content: Il nome utente e la password che usi per consultare la casella di posta elettronica che vuoi usare in Thunderbird.
creator: @next

content: We need more information before we can offer suggestions. Was this a transfer from another computer? A system crash?
creator: davidsk

content: - create a csv export from thunderbird so you have a model to follow - in excel, adjust the columns to use the same first row as in the model csv file - save in csv format - import to thunderbird
creator: davidsk

content: It is annoying that many customer support sites blame Thunderbird when they don't know the answer. I don't either, but if you post screenshots of your incoming server settings pane and your SMTP server settings pane, some suggestions will be forthcoming. My initial thought is that you might be running unencrypted on BT and EE probably requires encryption. The screenshots should show that. And that's just my initial guess.  :)
creator: davidsk

content: As there is no supported version of Thunderbird for ARM processors you will struggle to get support for what I guess is your community build. Perhaps try the distribution maintainers, I guess they are the ones doing the build.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: will it looks like it prints when I select print from the menu when the calendar is open on the screen (try Ctrl+P if you do not see a menu)
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
I do not see those folders as being related to the windows file explorer.

I can not replicate that in the new outlook, this is about as close as I can get

So I fired up my outlook365, and waited about 10 minutes for it to retrieve or load of whatever it does with my mailbox settings.

I can replicate it in the classic outlook, but it is folders hanging under the only account I have configured, not any local f0olders on the hard drive of my computer that would show up in the windows file explorer.

SO have got that far, Thunderbird does have a special account called local folders to which you can move emails to be stored on the local machine, independent of the account the mail was received on. Those will appear in Thunderbird as folders, but you will not see them as such in the windows file explorer, just as you did not see the outlook folders there.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: A much better idea would no use the SNAP version of Thunderbird that comes with ubuntu latest. ie stick to Arch packages instead of snaps. The snap package causes all sorts of issues as the sandbox is not correctly configured.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: I guess your new router is not correctly configured. If it was supplied by you internet provider, I suggest you consult with them about how to configure it to route emails which travel on different ports to web pages. If it came with a VPN you might try turning that off.
creator: MattAuSupport
